meanings.definition: To work together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The students were cooperating on the group project.
meanings.sent2: The team members were cooperating to finish the task on time.
meanings.sent3: The animals were cooperating to escape from the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The planets in the solar system were cooperating in their orbits.
meanings.sent5: The ants were cooperating to carry the food back to their nest.

meanings.sent1: The cooperating team won the championship.
meanings.sent2: The cooperating neighbors helped each other during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The cooperating birds built a nest together.
meanings.sent4: The cooperating countries signed a trade agreement.
meanings.sent5: The cooperating ants formed a line to gather food efficiently.
